references.paper_title: Mastering chess and shogi by self-play with a general reinforcement learning algorithm
references.reason: This paper showcases the success of reinforcement learning in mastering complex games, highlighting the potential of AI to surpass human capabilities and thus the necessity to understand their reasoning processes.

references.paper_title: LIMA: Less is more for alignment
